name: Lazer Runner
description:
This is a game where you need to position the laser in a way that it connects with the target. 

Then the exit will appear and you can proceed to the next level. 

You can use the green en yellow buttons to rotate en move the objects. 

The green button can be used by holding the button and swiping it to the left or right. 

The yellow button can be used by holding it and swiping it in the direction it needs to go. 

There might still be some bugs but most of them are patched. More updates will come in the following month.
